guides.name: George Mason University
guides.details: GMU offers Guaranteed Admission Agreements for NOVA students. Complete your associate degree and apply by the deadline.

guides.name: Virginia Commonwealth University
guides.details: VCU accepts many NOVA credits. Use the Transfer Guide to match your courses and plan ahead for major requirements.

guides.name: University of Virginia
guides.details: UVA encourages NOVA students to apply through the Transfer Admission Guarantee (TAG) for the College of Arts & Sciences.
